channel.title: Nazi Zombies v1.6.2.9 OPEN SOURCE
channel.description:
A while back I started working on my Nazi Zombie project here. Well it is nearly complete. It is still an open source project so I will be including the .gmk source file. This is for advanced users only who know how to program. Enjoy the game and happy zombie hunting!
[size=18pt][u][b]Zombie Game: http://up.ht/kLKD53 Zombie Source: http://up.ht/jExetC[/b][/u][/size]
Green = 100% Yellow = 50-75% Red = 0%
Features: Barriers Wave Control Zombies Dogs Crawlers Mystery Box Weapons(Not all have been uploaded to the game yet. So far about 20 total) Knifing Running Motion Shooting Zombie AI Doors Cash Sounds Reloading Animation Teleporters Fog
Images: [IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/screenshot100.png[/img] [IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/screenshot101.png[/img] [IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/screenshot102.png[/img] [IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/screenshot103.png[/img] [IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/screenshot104.png[/img] [IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/screenshot105.png[/img] [IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/screenshot106.png[/img] [IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/screenshot107.png[/img] [IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/screenshot108.png[/img] [IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/screenshot110.png[/img][IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/screenshot116.png[/img] [IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/screenshot117.png[/img]

I live about 45 minutes away from there!

The speed is no longer an issue. Take a look at the download below to see the new speeds using Game Maker 8.1. Now you can create a 3D game without the fear of lag.

http://glog.yoyogames.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/05/3DCube1.zip

item.title: Nazi Zombies v1.6.2.9 OPEN SOURCE
item.dc:creator: @_bool
item.description:
@_bool wrote:

[quote=“GML Programmer, post:44, topic:394378”][quote]Weaknesses of GML include but are not limited to:
•interpreted
•abstraction from the fun stuff, drawing etc
•arrays cannot be passed as function arguments due to the odd nature of the language
•variables can only be real numbers or strings
[/quote]
You can draw, arrays can be passed in GM8.1, variables can be anything now using GM8.1[/quote]

i meant you don’t design the rendering engine, it’s their crap.
also, it’s still interpreted and slow as dirt.

Read full topic

item.title: Nazi Zombies v1.6.2.9 OPEN SOURCE
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“GML Programmer, post:40, topic:394378”]Thanks everybody for all your productive critism and compliments. I am going to finish this game(and keep the source released) then I will look into other programming languages.

Until you absolutly understand Game Maker please do not say that it is slow or that it is for kids, any game you can make with any other programming language you CAN make with GML. I am 20 years old this May 31st and I have not seen one bit of evidence that Game Maker is weak in any way. Now with Game Maker 8.1 you can make browser games too using GML and HTML5. So as soon as I get that I will convert my Nazi Zombie game and Have it browser based with up to 4 players. Ill keep you all updated.[/quote]

Look forward to it.

Read full topic

item.title: Nazi Zombies v1.6.2.9 OPEN SOURCE

item.description:
@Nexus1 wrote:

Good luck, can’t wait to see the end product of your next game using a browser,

item.title: Nazi Zombies v1.6.2.9 OPEN SOURCE
item.dc:creator: @GML_Programmer GML Programmer
item.description:
@GML_Programmer wrote:

Thanks everybody for the support. I should have GM8.1 this week sometime(I hope), and just a little update I got it passed for a small gaming business using game maker =) W00t! I am getting a building within the next 2 weeks and the business will be open within the next 2-6 months! Look us up on google soon the business will be called T&S Games (T&S Game Creations)

Weaknesses of GML include but are not limited to: •interpreted •abstraction from the fun stuff, drawing etc •arrays cannot be passed as function arguments due to the odd nature of the language •variables can only be real numbers or strings
You can draw, arrays can be passed in GM8.1, variables can be anything now using GM8.1

Read full topic

Until you absolutly understand Game Maker please do not say that it is slow or that it is for kids, any game you can make with any other programming language you CAN make with GML. I am 20 years old this May 31st and I have not seen one bit of evidence that Game Maker is weak in any way. Now with Game Maker 8.1 you can make browser games too using GML and HTML5. So as soon as I get that I will convert my Nazi Zombie game and Have it browser based with up to 4 players. Ill keep you all updated.[/quote]

Weaknesses of GML include but are not limited to:

[ul][li]interpreted[/li]
[li]abstraction from the fun stuff, drawing etc[/li]
[li]arrays cannot be passed as function arguments due to the odd nature of the language[/li]
[li]variables can only be real numbers or strings[/li][/ul]

item.title: Nazi Zombies v1.6.2.9 OPEN SOURCE
item.dc:creator: @GML_Programmer GML Programmer
item.description:
@GML_Programmer wrote:

Thanks everybody for all your productive critism and compliments. I am going to finish this game(and keep the source released) then I will look into other programming languages.

Until you absolutly understand Game Maker please do not say that it is slow or that it is for kids, any game you can make with any other programming language you CAN make with GML. I am 20 years old this May 31st and I have not seen one bit of evidence that Game Maker is weak in any way. Now with Game Maker 8.1 you can make browser games too using GML and HTML5. So as soon as I get that I will convert my Nazi Zombie game and Have it browser based with up to 4 players. Ill keep you all updated.

item.title: Nazi Zombies v1.6.2.9 OPEN SOURCE
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“hadesflames, post:31, topic:394378”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=491562.msg3595919#msg3595919 date=1305071550]

Jeez man, learn some flash, I mean honestly with the new flash player coming we get hardware accelerated 3D ahahaha, that means I can use fash to make awesome 3D shit instead of 2D.

GML is shit.

Wow, no. Even this GML stuff is better than Flash. So please don’t waste your time learning flash.

I have no problem with him posting this GML stuff as long as he continues to post the source code.
[/quote]

+1

Flash is indeed a piece of crap. The only reason it hasn’t died yet is because no one’s produced a replacement just yet.

Normally, my money would be on google, but since they acquired youtube, it’s anyone’s game =P[/quote]
There is a flash replacement now in HTML5, it just can’t be widely adopted until more users switch to supporting browsers.

that being said, i have no problem with GML but you should probably move on to a more flexible language where you actually have control over the game engine and that isn’t slow as dirt.
